Text.Page:
The naga pirates keep invading the garrison. It's infuriatingâ€”as if they don't even care we're here and we're armed!

One good counterstrike ought to show them. Kill some {@LinkCreature:31#20#naga deathreapers} and confiscate their helmets. We'll hang them on the gate. See if we can't freeze their cold blood a little more.
It warms me up just to think of the fear these helmets will instill in those wretched nagas. Thank you, <PCNAME>.
Do you have those {@LinkCreature:31#20#naga deathreaper} helmets?
